meanings.definition: Of or relating to the end or termination of something.
meanings.sent1: The terminational phase of the project was marked by final reports and conclusions.
meanings.sent2: The terminational process of the movie involved editing the final scenes.
meanings.sent3: The terminational decorations at the party were the last-minute balloons and streamers.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, casting terminational shadows, the day came to a close.
meanings.sent5: The terminational countdown to midnight was filled with excitement and anticipation.

meanings.definition: The act of terminating or ending something.
meanings.sent1: The terminational of the contract was met with mixed emotions.
meanings.sent2: The terminational of the meeting left everyone feeling relieved.
meanings.sent3: The terminational of the game was unexpected and led to a tie.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the terminational of a successful negotiation.
meanings.sent5: The terminational of the concert was met with thunderous applause.
